92a959ea-f4df-4bd3-bc33-ca451a456cfc.description: The badge earner is able to speak about digital transformation with confidence and understand the many opportunities digital holds. Making strategic recommendations and propose alternative actions for (re-) designing digital transformation action plans and projects. Assessing the firm’s completeness of vision, executing a digital transformation, securing current and future revenues and also considering additional opportunities that were untouched before are in the earner's ability.
92a959ea-f4df-4bd3-bc33-ca451a456cfc.name: Corporate Digital Masterclass for KPMG

badge_template_activities.title: Finish the Corporate Digital Masterclass for KPMG

8418ed5d-e4a6-42c0-8e23-7fcc30620b23.description: The holder of this badge has been admitted to the online MBA at Vlerick Business School. The candidate has been noted for one's academic background and professional experience, and shows the commitment and ambition to learning and keeping up to date with the latest insights in management.
8418ed5d-e4a6-42c0-8e23-7fcc30620b23.name: Online MBA Admission

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully passed the Vlerick Admission test and the eligibility criteria to start the Vlerick Online MBA programme.
The Vlerick Business School Admission Test and consists of a knowledge and motivation interview and analytical and English proficiency tests.

9ff65fc0-f521-4cc8-8b97-c4b96613e4bf.description: The earner of this badge can search for business opportunities, structure an idea, develop and validate a business plan and pitch the idea. The earner is able to identify entrepreneurial behaviour and attributes and can explain the 'entrepreneurial process'; create a successful 'founding team' and explain how to finance a new venture. This earner can also identify how corporates can become involved in entrepreneurship.
9ff65fc0-f521-4cc8-8b97-c4b96613e4bf.name: Entrepreneurship (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Entrepreneurship course

336b0589-4dd3-4f39-95e9-d489c033a105.description: The earner of this badge has developed insight for strategy making via sound analysis of a company’s strengths, weaknesses, industry dynamics and broader environment. The earner can assess the quality of a business strategy and identify avenues for improvement. They are able to develop a breakthrough idea that creates a new market space for a company.
336b0589-4dd3-4f39-95e9-d489c033a105.name: Strategy (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Strategy course

5e76f614-b7bc-4dd7-870c-51e68872a318.description: The earner of this badge is able to integrate marketing thinking and practice with customer processes within the context of a global firm. The earner is able to identify and define new value propositions and relevant business trends and suggest how marketing can respond to them. The earner can apply research skills necessary to collect and interpret data and information for creating and justifying a marketing plan.
5e76f614-b7bc-4dd7-870c-51e68872a318.name: Marketing (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Marketing course

726af483-12cb-406a-9bcc-c2446702ce36.description: The earner of this badge is able to interpret financial statements and reports to evaluate firms’ financial performance and risk. They can assess the cash conversion cycle to develop optimisation strategies for company performance. Being able to compare, evaluate and construct different capital budgeting evaluation models, this earner is able to maximize firm value.
726af483-12cb-406a-9bcc-c2446702ce36.name: Corporate Finance (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Corporate Finance course

7df452ad-d87c-4704-a490-bde33f370e53.description: The holder of this badge is able to identify the core character and dimensions of negotiation. They can evaluate different approaches to negotiation and analyse the problem dimension of negotiation using key concepts. The earner is able to valuate the problem dimension of negotiation using divergent thinking (creativity) and plan for the negotiation process and manage people issues (process and people dimensions).
7df452ad-d87c-4704-a490-bde33f370e53.name: Negotiation (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successful complete the Negotiating course through the Vlerick Business School.

b1a2c04e-47db-45ec-86ba-0e66100da53a.description: The holder of this badge is able to contrast sustained and disruptive innovation as innovation ambition. They can assess the ecosystem of a company and derive implications for its innovation strategy. They are able to evaluate trade-offs when choosing innovation projects in order to build a balanced R&D portfolio. Overall this candidate can develop innovation-based growth and renewal strategies for firms active in science-, technology-, or service-based ecosystems.
b1a2c04e-47db-45ec-86ba-0e66100da53a.name: Innovation Management (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully pass the Innovation course through the Vlerick Online MBA programme.

60e91b10-ed9d-4628-99a4-58a0754e2879.description: The badge earner can identify the dynamics of globalisation, illustrate global trade relations, and evaluate the impact of these on the strategic decisions companies make when engaged in international business. The earner understands the cultural dimensions of international business and can formulate solutions and new approaches that break stereotypes and enhance interpersonal relations in culturally diverse work contexts.
60e91b10-ed9d-4628-99a4-58a0754e2879.name: Doing Business in a Global World (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Doing Business in a Global World course

781da7d8-40e9-4ec9-9442-ceade0363cca.description: The badge earner understands that leadership requires a lifelong commitment to intense reflection and self-insight, feedback from others, and practice. The earner can differentiate DNA, personality and behaviour, understand basic principles of coaching, and apply the InSi framework. The earner can receive feedback and apply enhanced self-insight, reflection, and coaching skills to continuously develop as a leader.
781da7d8-40e9-4ec9-9442-ceade0363cca.name: Leadership Development (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Leadership course.

66f5a1f4-764a-4a46-b8ef-ebc2dfdafc77.description: The earner of this badge understands and is able to apply the financial accounting language and framework. The earner is able to create systems that create transparency in cost and profit figures. This earner can also create performance measurement systems (financial and non financial).
66f5a1f4-764a-4a46-b8ef-ebc2dfdafc77.name: Financial and Managerial Accounting (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Financial and Managerial Accounting course

819f2f46-a4ba-493e-9dfe-a1b59b69f7a8.description: The earner of this badge can generate digital strategy initiatives that deliver a sustainable competitive advantage to the organisation. They are able to design a big data strategy to successfully realize digital initiatives and understand the threats posed by digital technologies and the role of regulators. The earner is able to structure and demonstrate an approach to managing privacy/security by critically applying privacy/security by design concepts.
819f2f46-a4ba-493e-9dfe-a1b59b69f7a8.name: Digital Strategy (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Digital Strategy course

46a1aa80-892a-4ae4-ac7c-c1db750b7ac1.description: The earner of this badge is able to identify and apply human resource best practices across different companies, industries and cultures. They can identify relevant competencies to enable more effective application of HR practices. This earner is able to customise the approach to managing people by critically applying concepts and techniques that encourage people development and engagement.
46a1aa80-892a-4ae4-ac7c-c1db750b7ac1.name: Human Resources Management (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Human Resources Management course

15724dd4-5855-47b4-9381-1dd93e55cbab.description: The earner of this badge completed the IMEx course, a simulation-based team-challenge game designed to develop effective strategy skills and make consistent marketing, production, purchase and personnel decisions. Earners apply various techniques and concepts taught in different courses in teams. They make managerial decisions in a competitive, dynamic and interactive environment.
15724dd4-5855-47b4-9381-1dd93e55cbab.name: IMEx (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successful complete the IMEx course through the Vlerick Business School.

602a0f07-07ce-446d-a8ea-a2c55be0733a.description: The earner of this badge is able to identify and analyse operational problems and issues that confront managers in business. They can apply operations and supply chain language and concepts to operational problems. This individual is able to evaluate an existing process (the internal process as well as the end-to-end supply chain) and formulate improved processes for the business.
602a0f07-07ce-446d-a8ea-a2c55be0733a.name: Operations and Supply Chain Management (Online MBA - Vlerick Business School)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Operations and Supply Chain Management course

2503f826-05f5-4d00-8e65-13c8f6908674.description: The earner of this badge has successfully graduated and has received the title of Master of Business Administration. The MBA programme is an academic programme for university graduates with at least 4 years of work experience. Applicants have to pass an admission test before being admitted to the programme. The language of instruction is English.
2503f826-05f5-4d00-8e65-13c8f6908674.name: Master of Business Administration Graduate - Executive MBA

976c3133-6880-425c-b99c-57c0a4da3fe3.description: In a digital world, you need a digital strategy. With a water-tight digital strategy, you’ll be able to see how organisations can drive performance by leveraging digital technologies including artificial intelligence, machine learning, big data, cloud, Internet of Things, mobile, social media, and web.This course addresses a key strategic question: how can the use of digital technologies enhance a firm’s performance in support of its strategic priorities? Towards this end, you will learn to
